WorkItem.Description:
I'm developping app for windows mobile 6 with vb.net 2008.
When i try to create a route from two points i dont have any route. 
Whatching with debug i beleave that the problem is the directive - #if !PocketPC - in the function GetRouteBetweenPointsUrl in file Gmap.cs of the GMap.Net.Core.
The function is executed well from PC but from Mobile Phone do nothing.
If possible to cancel this directive? or i must do other function to create route?
Thanks
WorkItem.Summary: Problem developping app for windows mobile

Comments.Message:
I forget to say that i'm using the changeset 22b93afd000c
Max

I have resolved the problem. Removed all the directives that exclude the execution of the code for windows mobile, resolved some error in rebuild of windows mobile dll and now work fine.
For detailed explaint let me know
Bye

Max
